website_summaries.verdict: Great for tough jobs and for thorough cleaning. The best push broom on the market right now.
pros: Sweeps all types of dirt and debris with a combination of soft outer bristles and rugged inner bristles
Made with recycled materials for green living
cons: At 15 pounds, smaller consumers might find this broom awkward to use

customer_reviews.title: Best lightweight push broom ever!
customer_reviews.text: This broom is terrific! It is light, but durable...you can't tell from the picture, but the outside bristles are plastic, made from recycled soda bottles. Now that is green! the inner bristles are stiffer and pick up the small rocks and debris like leaves, and the stuff my Bradford Pear trees leave all over my deck. It is also very useful for the garage and driveway. Some of the reviewers mentioned that it was great for brushing snow off their cars, well it is near the end of May now, but I am sure I will get to put it to use when the snow comes in December and January...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I CAN'T RETURN THIS! ZERO STARS
customer_reviews.text: Opened box and as I began to remove the packaging from the handle and broom head noticed a rank smell. Upon further inspection, I believe this item is covered with dried urine. Absolutely disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: TrigF

customer_reviews.title: Bristles frayed after first use; light duty broom
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight broom sweeps snow and removes rock salt from the garage floor. For the way the bristles frayed after the first use, I am concerned about how long it will last. However, it is less than half the weight of an average shop broom. I couldn't use any heavier broom, so it works for me , but for a serious wood /car/ machine work garage, it would not be useable.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Clark

customer_reviews.title: Review from left handed mom
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait 16 years to get a push broom? I love it! I can't believe the dirt / fine dirt it can get out of my cement stoop. Can't wait to use it on the rain.On a whim, I tried to use it to brush the lower baseboards on my house that were all dirty from the rain splashing up garden dirt. Wow! It all came right off! I thought I'd have to scrub and wash it off. Can't wait to use it on my beautiful fence that has dirt splashed all over the bottom, from the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Kd

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I am seriously inpressed!
customer_reviews.text: What an outstanding broom! Incredibly secure attachment between the head and the handle and the bristles are incredibly affective! This feels like it will last forever! What a great product, great job O Cedar!
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Okay broom, not too good on rough surfaces, came in a box the size of an aircraft carrier
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This broom does the trick I ordered it for. Packing & shipping were problem free and this broom grabs anything on my garage floor and moves it with ease. Would be a 5 star but I seem to have to tighten the broom handle connection every so often but not a huge problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The handle attachment screw keeps coming loose and the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: The handle attachment screw keeps coming loose and the handle falls off. This is a major design flaw and needs to be re-evaluated.
customer_reviews.author: Worth

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of push brooms for around the house for around 20-40 bucks as I did not want to spent hundreds of dollars on one. This was the best of the bunch. I will have to check if they make a wider version, if so, I will get that, too.
customer_reviews.author: 40something

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this strictly to remove snow form our cars. I always had problems with my old broom head unscrewing from the handle while using it. Well that problem is a thing of the past, with the design this broom uses to attach the head to handle. If you are looking for a good multi purpose broom and don't want to deal with continually tightening the handle to the head of other brooms, look no further, you have found it.
customer_reviews.author: Diehard

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great broom - handle is metal and the bottom is not heavy. We paid $24.99 and happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Bargin Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very solid push-broom.
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely gets around the usual type of problem brooms like this encounters: namely it has a very solid and firm connecction between the brush and the handle. I anticipate it will not fail until the broom is totally worn out.
customer_reviews.author: DNP77

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BROOM!
customer_reviews.text: Love the connection of broom head to handle. I don't foresee this one coming apart like most others do. Brilliant design and sturdy. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ekay

customer_reviews.title: Nice indoor broom
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for cleaning large hardwood expanse. The handle that doesn't unscrew is a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Susi

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product for sweeping out my garage. I used it as soon as it arrived. It is light weight and easy to handle. It does a good job of removing dirt and leaves that have gotten in garage.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works great. The handle will loosen up every once in a while but a quick hand tighten of the nut and your good to go for another month or so.
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: I love that it is made from solid materials that won't ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a previous deck broom I had. I love that it is made from solid materials that won't rust and break like my previous one. Its prime use is to push snow from my deck and it is solid enough to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: LilRascal82

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: I use this broom on my composite deck year round. From sweeping the dog hair in the summer to pushing light snow off in the winter. It works great.

customer_reviews.title: I love the smaller size of this broom
customer_reviews.text: I love the smaller size of this broom. I also like how it connects to the handle. The bigger brooms were too heavy and would come unscrewed during use. This is a great broom.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: Great for concrete floors
customer_reviews.text: Use this to sweep and scrub my concrete floors. Works great!

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Easy to use. I use this on my porch and garage.

customer_reviews.title: Nice broom
customer_reviews.text: Nice broom. Got it for outside things. The way the stick is held into the broom, it will never come loose and spin around .

customer_reviews.title: We use it on a deck,
customer_reviews.text: We use it on a deck, and on our long driveway and parking pad - still works and bristles are intact

customer_reviews.title: A QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: A VERY good and reliable broom, unlike the wood handled ones that fall apart or strip out, this one hasn't had that problem.

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Two star because it works like a broom is suppose to. However, it arrived severally damaged. Go to a hardware store and save yourself the trouble.

customer_reviews.title: Solid broom. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I got this broom for clearing off my porch (plans with leaves and debris) and driveway (concrete with pebbles and dirt). It handles the different surfaces quite well. The compact head is light weight and easy to maneuver and provides full contact with the ground the length of the brush.

customer_reviews.title: Has to be screwed back on every few sweeps
customer_reviews.text: broom sweeps fine but always has to be screwed back on. I thought that was the big selling point on it. I have two of them and the same problem with both

customer_reviews.title: Sweeping walks
customer_reviews.text: Snow, dirt, leaf litter, I've been using this broom to keep my walks clean since I got it. It has performed admirably against all of these materials.

customer_reviews.title: Biggest Scrub Brush Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have to state up front that I've never used this as a broom. But I do use the head as the biggest scrub brush ever. And for that purpose it rocks! To see more about how I use it go to

customer_reviews.text: Decent broom for the price, however the handle bent on me after a few weeks of use. Was unable to find a replacement handle because of the Maxi-Lok technology that connects the handle to the broom.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: used for patio; light weight, quantity and quality of fibers in the broom work to really push debris and patio dust versus picking it up in the broom fibers as other push brooms I've tried.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and works fine
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and works fine. Not much more to say.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good broom and as advertised. Softer bristles on outside with firm in middle. Will be good for my deck

customer_reviews.title: Good broom does what it's suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: Good broom does what it's suppose to do, and so far I like the locking mechanism better than the old screw in type.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Attachment is solid and size is great for my porch.
customer_reviews.author: Marc M.

customer_reviews.title: to short
customer_reviews.text: Handle is way to short. Otherwise its a broom. Shoulda gone to lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Team Vaal

customer_reviews.title: may require slight modification for handle to fit...
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty sturdy broom, although definitely not heavy duty. Mine arrived with the 1/4" metal bolt attached incorrectly. If the bolt is not centered between the two flanges on the connecting plastic, the handle won't sit snugly into the receiver and you won't be able to screw the nut down that keeps the handle on. I took a 1/4" socket wrench and pulled the bolt out... there is a handy hole in the plastic that you can line up with the hole in the handle (see image). With that slight modification, it all fits as it should. Three stars because give me a break O-Cedar, you had one job: there is exactly one bolt on this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and does a nice job
customer_reviews.text: This broom is simple to assemble, the locking hub will prevent the handle from coming loose and it is a sturdy built broom. The outer bristles are softer than the inner bristles allowing you to sweep up light and small objects as well as more coarse or heavier objects - like wet sand versus dust. The only very minor change I would make is to lengthen the handle a few inches, it just seems a little bit short to me and I'm only 5'7" tall. But really, it's a nice broom for sweeping the driveway, sidewalk or basement concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Dad

customer_reviews.title: Super glued the handle to the base because
customer_reviews.text: Super glued the handle to the base because, as the other reviews stated, it comes unscrewed constantly otherwise. Once I glued the handle to the base on this broom it has worked wonderfully on my cement back porch, garage floor, and driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Steele

customer_reviews.title: Good broom
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a push broom and didn't want to drive to the store to pick one up. I was curious to see how a push broom would get shipped in the mail. Now I know: the broom head screws on. Decent push broom and does what I need it to for sweeping the garage and our patio.
customer_reviews.author: James Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent broom
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I went to Amazon for this broom. It is well made and I love the full bristles for sweeping the patio. The handle screws to the broom head easily and stays put, no fussing with this broom.
customer_reviews.author: athena

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sweep a wide area of broken pumpkins. It did the job. I even bought the 24 inch as well as the 18. Both have held up beautifully. My 18 inch was buried in snow for a winter (yes it was me and not my kids that did it) and when the snow melted it still worked just like new.
customer_reviews.author: KAnd

customer_reviews.title: Broom do good, move much,  happy go team
customer_reviews.text: You push it, it moves trash. Stop reading reviews on a broom ffs

customer_reviews.title: Clean sweep
customer_reviews.text: I use this broom to sweep off my patios and sidewalks I don’t have one bad thing to say about this broom it’s perfect the locking handle is in genius and it’s sweeping performance is unmatched if you buy it you’ll love it

customer_reviews.title: Received a broken product
customer_reviews.text: I was happy when I received the package but then I opened it up and saw a deep severe dent in the handle (see attached pics). I can't believe they send their customers broken products like this.

customer_reviews.title: I know the push broom will serve my purpose of ...
customer_reviews.text: I know the push broom will serve my purpose of sweeping the rain water from the walkway outside my condo. (A regular house broom is back- breaking.) Wouldn't you know? We've had no accumulation of water on the walkway since my receiving the broom. Oh,well, the rains WILL come and I will have my push broom to meet the challenge.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Received on-time and packaged well. It assembled easily for me. Does a good job.

customer_reviews.title: Handle to broom design could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this broom for some months. It feels a bit loose. Needs have a better way to tighten the handle to the broom head. It comes loose every usage. The bristles for our garage cleaning could be a bit finer. The product is useful and appreciated.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the 18" size vs. the usual 24 inch which was always a bit large for me.

customer_reviews.title: ... tiled flooring throughout the house and this broom works fantastic at getting the debris off the surface
customer_reviews.text: I have tiled flooring throughout the house and this broom works fantastic at getting the debris off the surface. It has a good width and removes dirt evenly. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: hedwig e preble

customer_reviews.title: New handle is awesome
customer_reviews.text: The new improvement of the stay in place handle is great!!! I have the exact broom without the new feature and it was constantly coming loose. Now, the old broom has been stuck away. This new one is a delight.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Locking handle is an awesome feature.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Bristles move dirt and dust like no other broom I've used, and the locking handle is brilliant. There are few things more frustrating that having a handle come loose, constantly, while trying to broom a 10,000 SF warehouse!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Overall a decent broom with a good positive attachment to the handle that prevents twisting
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent broom with a good positive attachment to the handle that prevents twisting. Unfortunately it has a cheap thin plastic cap at the end of the handle with a hole for hanging on the wall. After several weeks the plastic cap split down the side and slips off the end of the handle. This makes the broom hard to use as the raw metal handle edge is hard on the hands. I would not purchase this again. One cheap part makes the whole broom almost useless.

product_meta.title: O-Cedar Professional 18" Multi-Surface Push Broom, Green
product_meta.description: The ultimate in outdoor push brooms, this multi-surface broom features a secure head, even during rough use. Its heavy-duty plastic block won't crack, warp or mildew, while the Memory Bristles retain their shape for long-lasting sweeping performance.
feature_bullets: Features Maxi-Lok technology and anti-rotation socket so broom head never comes loose
with broom block and bristles made of 80% recycled material
Has soft outer bristles that sweep up fine dirt particles, while sturdy inner bristles sweep away large debris
Works great for garages, sidewalks, decks and other outdoor surfaces
Use & Care Instructions: Shake or rinse broom after each use to remove excess debris. For best results, hang to store. Keep broom fiber away from wall and off the floor.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars239 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
